United States Court of Appeals
                      For the First Circuit

No. 10-1320

                         UNITED STATES,

                            Appellee,

                               v.

                         ERIC MOLIGNARO,

                      Defendant, Appellant.


                             ERRATA

     The opinion of this Court, issued on July 6, 2011, should be

amended as follows.

     On page 2, line 2, replace "six" with "24."
